admreg: Middle East and North Africa,Middle East and North Africa
trustfund: TF093487-BANKING SECTOR REFORM PROJECT,TF094193-EMERGENCY BANKING SECTOR REFORM PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The Banking Sector Reform Project for
            Iraq had an overall moderately satisfactory outcome, with
            the Bank's performance deemed to be satisfactory, while
            the borrower's performance was felt to be moderately
            satisfactory. The project indicators show encouraging
            improvements and progress. Significant lessons were learned
            during the implementation of the project in the following
            areas: 1) strong analytic underpinning and building on other
            operations; 2) consultations with stakeholders for building
            consensus; 3) effective cooperation with development
            practices for ensuring good coordination, and leveraging in
            pushing reforms; 4) strong and sustained partnership; 5)
            difficulties in finding international experts to travel to
            Baghdad because of the security situation; and 6) the
            importance of a combination of on-site and off-site missions
            for operations in conflict countries.
